named-query.name: PRICE_LIST_DESCRIPTOR_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT descriptor FROM PriceListDescriptorImpl AS descriptor WHERE descriptor.guid = ?1

named-query.name: PRICE_LIST_DESCRIPTOR_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT descriptor FROM PriceListDescriptorImpl AS descriptor WHERE descriptor.name = ?1

named-query.name: PRICE_LIST_DESCRIPTOR_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT descriptor FROM PriceListDescriptorImpl AS descriptor

named-query.name: PRICE_LIST_DESCRIPTOR_ALL_NON_HIDDEN
named-query.query: SELECT descriptor FROM PriceListDescriptorImpl AS descriptor WHERE descriptor.hidden = false

named-query.name: PRICE_LIST_DESCRIPTORS_BY_GUIDS
named-query.query: SELECT descriptor FROM PriceListDescriptorImpl AS descriptor WHERE descriptor.guid in (:list)

named-query.name: PRICE_LIST_DESCRIPTOR_NAME_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT descriptor.name FROM PriceListDescriptorImpl AS descriptor WHERE descriptor.guid = ?1

named-query.name: PRICE_ADJUSTMENT_BY_PL_BCGUID_OLD
named-query.query: SELECT bc.priceAdjustments FROM BundleConstituentImpl AS bc JOIN bc.priceAdjustments AS pa WHERE pa.priceListGuid = ?1 AND bc.guid in (:list)

named-query.name: PRICE_ADJUSTMENT_AND_BCGUID_BY_PL_BCGUID
named-query.query: SELECT bc.guid, pa FROM BundleConstituentImpl AS bc, IN(bc.priceAdjustments) AS pa WHERE pa.priceListGuid = :plGuid AND bc.guid in (:list)

named-query.name: PRICE_ADJUSTMENT_BY_PL_BCGUID
named-query.query: SELECT bc FROM BundleConstituentImpl as bc WHERE bc.guid in (:list)

named-query.name: PRICE_ADJUSTMENT_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT adjustment FROM PriceAdjustmentImpl AS adjustment WHERE adjustment.guid = ?1

named-query.name: PRICE_ADJUSTMENT_BY_PL_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT adjustment FROM PriceAdjustmentImpl AS adjustment WHERE adjustment.priceListGuid = ?1

named-query.name: BASE_AMOUNT_BY_PLDG_OBJECTG
named-query.query: SELECT ba FROM BaseAmountImpl AS ba WHERE ba.priceListDescriptorGuid IN (:pricelists) AND ba.objectGuid IN (:productskus)

named-query.name: BASE_AMOUNTS_BY_EXT_FILTER_LOWVALUE_UPVALUE_PROVIDED
named-query.query: SELECT ba FROM BaseAmountImpl AS ba WHERE (ba.priceListDescriptorGuid = ?1 OR ?1 IS NULL) AND ((ba.objectType = ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL) AND (LOWER(ba.objectGuid) LIKE ?3 OR ?3 IS NULL) OR (ba.objectGuid IN (:list) AND (ba.objectType <> ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL))) AND ((ba.listValueInternal BETWEEN ?4 AND ?5) OR (ba.saleValueInternal BETWEEN ?4 AND ?5)) AND (ba.quantityInternal = ?6 OR ?6 IS NULL)

named-query.name: BASE_AMOUNTS_BY_EXT_FILTER_LOWVALUE_PROVIDED
named-query.query: SELECT ba FROM BaseAmountImpl AS ba WHERE (ba.priceListDescriptorGuid = ?1 OR ?1 IS NULL) AND ((ba.objectType = ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL) AND (LOWER(ba.objectGuid) LIKE ?3 OR ?3 IS NULL) OR (ba.objectGuid IN (:list) AND (ba.objectType <> ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL))) AND ((ba.listValueInternal >= ?4) OR (ba.saleValueInternal >= ?4)) AND (ba.quantityInternal = ?5 OR ?5 IS NULL)

named-query.name: BASE_AMOUNTS_BY_EXT_FILTER_UPVALUE_PROVIDED
named-query.query: SELECT ba FROM BaseAmountImpl AS ba WHERE (ba.priceListDescriptorGuid = ?1 OR ?1 IS NULL) AND ((ba.objectType = ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL) AND (LOWER(ba.objectGuid) LIKE ?3 OR ?3 IS NULL) OR (ba.objectGuid IN (:list) AND (ba.objectType <> ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL))) AND ((ba.listValueInternal<= ?4) OR (ba.saleValueInternal<= ?4)) AND (ba.quantityInternal = ?5 OR ?5 IS NULL)

named-query.name: BASE_AMOUNTS_BY_EXT_FILTER
named-query.query: SELECT ba FROM BaseAmountImpl AS ba WHERE (ba.priceListDescriptorGuid = ?1 OR ?1 IS NULL) AND ((ba.objectType = ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL) AND (LOWER(ba.objectGuid) LIKE ?3 OR ?3 IS NULL) OR (ba.objectGuid IN (:list) AND (ba.objectType <> ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL))) AND (ba.quantityInternal = ?4 OR ?4 IS NULL)

named-query.name: BASE_AMOUNTS_BY_EXT_FILTER_CASE_SENSITIVE_LOWVALUE_UPVALUE_PROVIDED
named-query.query: SELECT ba FROM BaseAmountImpl AS ba WHERE (ba.priceListDescriptorGuid = ?1 OR ?1 IS NULL) AND ((ba.objectType = ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL) AND (ba.objectGuid LIKE ?3 OR ?3 IS NULL) OR (ba.objectGuid IN (:list) AND (ba.objectType <> ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL))) AND ((ba.listValueInternal BETWEEN ?4 AND ?5) OR (ba.saleValueInternal BETWEEN ?4 AND ?5)) AND (ba.quantityInternal = ?6 OR ?6 IS NULL)

named-query.name: BASE_AMOUNTS_BY_EXT_FILTER_CASE_SENSITIVE_LOWVALUE_PROVIDED
named-query.query: SELECT ba FROM BaseAmountImpl AS ba WHERE (ba.priceListDescriptorGuid = ?1 OR ?1 IS NULL) AND ((ba.objectType = ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL) AND (ba.objectGuid LIKE ?3 OR ?3 IS NULL) OR (ba.objectGuid IN (:list) AND (ba.objectType <> ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL))) AND ((ba.listValueInternal >= ?4) OR (ba.saleValueInternal >= ?4)) AND (ba.quantityInternal = ?5 OR ?5 IS NULL)

named-query.name: BASE_AMOUNTS_BY_EXT_FILTER_CASE_SENSITIVE_UPVALUE_PROVIDED
named-query.query: SELECT ba FROM BaseAmountImpl AS ba WHERE (ba.priceListDescriptorGuid = ?1 OR ?1 IS NULL) AND ((ba.objectType = ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL) AND (ba.objectGuid LIKE ?3 OR ?3 IS NULL) OR (ba.objectGuid IN (:list) AND (ba.objectType <> ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL))) AND ((ba.listValueInternal<= ?4) OR (ba.saleValueInternal<= ?4)) AND (ba.quantityInternal = ?5 OR ?5 IS NULL)

named-query.name: BASE_AMOUNTS_BY_EXT_FILTER_CASE_SENSITIVE
named-query.query: SELECT ba FROM BaseAmountImpl AS ba WHERE (ba.priceListDescriptorGuid = ?1 OR ?1 IS NULL) AND ((ba.objectType = ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL) AND (ba.objectGuid LIKE ?3 OR ?3 IS NULL) OR (ba.objectGuid IN (:list) AND (ba.objectType <> ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL))) AND (ba.quantityInternal = ?4 OR ?4 IS NULL)

named-query.name: BASE_AMOUNTS_BY_PRICELIST_BY_OBJECTS
named-query.query: SELECT ba FROM BaseAmountImpl AS ba WHERE ba.priceListDescriptorGuid = :priceListDescriptorGuid AND ba.objectType = :objectType AND ba.objectGuid IN (:objectGuids)

named-query.name: BASE_AMOUNT_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT ba FROM BaseAmountImpl AS ba WHERE ba.guid = ?1

named-query.name: DELETE_BASE_AMOUNTS
named-query.query: DELETE FROM BaseAmountImpl AS ba WHERE ba.objectGuid = ?1 AND ba.objectType = ?2

named-query.name: DELETE_BASE_AMOUNTS_BY_PRICE_LIST_GUID
named-query.query: DELETE FROM BaseAmountImpl AS ba WHERE ba.priceListDescriptorGuid = ?1

named-query.name: BASE_AMOUNT_GUID_SELECT_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT ba.guid FROM BaseAmountImpl ba WHERE ba.guid = ?1

named-query.name: PRICE_LIST_ASSIGNMENTS_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT pla FROM PriceListAssignmentImpl as pla

named-query.name: PRICE_LIST_ASSIGNMENTS_ALL_VISIBLE_ONLY
named-query.query: SELECT pla FROM PriceListAssignmentImpl as pla WHERE pla.hidden = false

named-query.name: PRICE_LIST_ASSIGNMENTS_CATALOG_CURRENCY
named-query.query: SELECT pla FROM PriceListAssignmentImpl as pla WHERE pla.catalog.code = ?1 AND pla.priceListDescriptor.currencyCode = ?2

named-query.name: PRICE_LIST_ASSIGNMENTS_CATALOG_CURRENCY_VISIBLE_ONLY
named-query.query: SELECT pla FROM PriceListAssignmentImpl as pla WHERE pla.catalog.code = ?1 AND pla.priceListDescriptor.currencyCode = ?2 AND pla.hidden = false

named-query.name: PRICE_LIST_ASSIGNMENTS_CATALOG_PRICELIST
named-query.query: SELECT pla FROM PriceListAssignmentImpl as pla WHERE (?1 IS NULL OR pla.catalog.name LIKE ?1) AND (?2 IS NULL OR pla.priceListDescriptor.name LIKE ?2)

named-query.name: PRICE_LIST_ASSIGNMENTS_CATALOG_PRICELIST_VISIBLE_ONLY
named-query.query: SELECT pla FROM PriceListAssignmentImpl as pla WHERE (?1 IS NULL OR pla.catalog.name LIKE ?1) AND (?2 IS NULL OR pla.priceListDescriptor.name LIKE ?2) AND pla.hidden = false

named-query.name: PRICE_LIST_ASSIGNMENTS_CATALOG_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT pla FROM PriceListAssignmentImpl as pla WHERE pla.catalog.code = ?1

named-query.name: PRICE_LIST_ASSIGNMENTS_CATALOG_CODE_VISIBLE_ONLY
named-query.query: SELECT pla FROM PriceListAssignmentImpl as pla WHERE pla.catalog.code = ?1 AND pla.hidden = false

named-query.name: PRICE_LIST_ASSIGNMENTS_FIND_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT pla FROM PriceListAssignmentImpl as pla WHERE pla.guid = ?1

named-query.name: PRICE_LIST_ASSIGNMENTS_FIND_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT pla FROM PriceListAssignmentImpl as pla WHERE pla.name = ?1

named-query.name: PRICE_LIST_ASSIGNMENTS_PRICE_LIST_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT pla FROM PriceListAssignmentImpl as pla WHERE pla.priceListDescriptor.guid = ?1

named-query.name: CATALOG_GUIDS_THAT_HAVE_PLAS
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT pla.catalog.code FROM PriceListAssignmentImpl AS pla

named-query.name: PRICE_LIST_ASSIGNMENT_NAME_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT pla.name FROM PriceListAssignmentImpl as pla WHERE pla.guid = ?1
